title: Kurdistan
summary: Kurdistan (Kurdish: کوردستان ,Kurdistan‎ [ˌkʊɾdɪˈstɑːn] (listen); lit. "land of the Kurds")[5] or Greater Kurdistan[6][7] is a roughly defined geo-cultural territory in Western Asia wherein the Kurdish people form a prominent majority population[8] and the Kurdish culture, languages, and national identity have historically been based.[9] Geographically, Kurdistan roughly encompasses the northwestern Zagros and the eastern Taurus mountain ranges.[10]
